publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-13.1 Mr Jamie Stone: A9—As an amendment to motion (S2M-13) in the name of Murdo Fraser, insert at end "further recognises that the A9 does not finish at Inverness; welcomes the improvements committed for the A9 at the Ord of Caithness; believes that important work needs to be done to upgrade the road north of Inverness to an acceptable single carriageway standard, and urges the Executive to conduct a safety analysis of the A9 from Perth to Thurso in order to prioritise further improvements."

S2M-13.1 Mr Jamie Stone: A9—As an amendment to motion (S2M-13) in the name of Murdo Fraser, insert at end "further recognises that the A9 does not finish at Inverness; welcomes the improvements committed for the A9 at the Ord of Caithness; believes that important work needs to be done to upgrade the road north of Inverness to an acceptable single carriageway standard, and urges the Executive to conduct a safety analysis of the A9 from Perth to Thurso in order to prioritise further improvements."
S2M-13.1 A9 (lodged on 13 May 2003) Donald Gorrie*
